name: Aalborg
fun_fact: Fun fact: Aalborg has been producing aquavit (akvavit) since 1846, and Aalborg Akvavit is one of the world's most famous spirits - the distillery even has a 'Line Aquavit' that crosses the equator twice by ship before being sold, as the rocking motion is believed to improve the flavor!
